title: DSE Constraint Logic Runtime Manifest
description: Maps a verified Constraint Logic Hash to its deployment artifact and execution environment definition, ensuring deterministic execution of constraints.

ExecutionEnvironment.description: Defines the requirements for the sandboxed execution environment.

platform_id.description: Identifier for the standardized DSE runtime platform version/profile.

required_libraries.description: Specific non-standard dependencies or modules required by the constraint logic.

entry_point.description: The specific function, method, or file to invoke within the deployment artifact.

logic_hash.description: The SHA256 hash (ID) of the deterministic constraint logic/code payload.

runtime_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific deployment/runtime configuration.

container_image_reference.description: Pointer to the certified, immutable execution environment image (e.g., Docker registry tag/digest or content address).
